Rules.InvariantScript:
Switch(
    key,
    "Launch Pad", Navigate(LaunchPad, ScreenTransition.Fade),
    "Brain Stash", Navigate(BrainStash, ScreenTransition.Fade),
    "The Pantry", Navigate(ThePantry, ScreenTransition.Fade)
)

ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString:
// "key" is the screen name passed in from the component
Switch(
    key,
    "Launch Pad",    Navigate(LaunchPad, ScreenTransition.Fade),
    "Brain Stash",   Navigate(BrainStash, ScreenTransition.Fade),
    "Client Depot",  Navigate(ClientDepot, ScreenTransition.Fade),
    "The Pantry",    Navigate(ThePantry, ScreenTransition.Fade),
     "Becca Bot",    Navigate(BeccaBot, ScreenTransition.Fade)
  
)
